00020 template<typename eT>
00021 inline
00022 diagview<eT>::~diagview()
00023   {
00024   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00025   }
00026 
00027 
00028 template<typename eT>
00029 inline
00030 diagview<eT>::diagview(const basic_mat<eT>& in_m, const u32 in_row_offset, const u32 in_col_offset, const u32 in_len)
00031   : m(in_m)
00032   , m_ptr(0)
00033   , row_offset(in_row_offset)
00034   , col_offset(in_col_offset)
00035   , n_elem(in_len)
00036 //   , len
00037 //       (
00038 //       (id == 0)
00039 //         ? (std::min)(m.n_rows, m.n_cols) 
00040 //         : (
00041 //           (id > 0)
00042 //             ? (std::min)(m.n_rows,      m.n_cols - id)
00043 //             : (std::min)(m.n_rows + id, m.n_cols     )
00044 //           )
00045 //       )
00046   {
00047   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00048   }
00049

00051 
00052 template<typename eT>
00053 inline
00054 diagview<eT>::diagview(basic_mat<eT>& in_m, const u32 in_row_offset, const u32 in_col_offset, const u32 in_len)
00055   : m(in_m)
00056   , m_ptr(&in_m)
00057   , row_offset(in_row_offset)
00058   , col_offset(in_col_offset)
00059   , n_elem(in_len)
00060   {
00061   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00062   }

00065 
00066 //! set a diagonal of our matrix using data from a foreign object
00067 template<typename eT>
00068 template<typename T1>
00069 inline
00070 void
00071 diagview<eT>::operator= (const arma_base<eT,T1>& o)
00072   {
00073   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00074   arma_check( (m_ptr == 0), "diagview::operator=(): matrix is read only");
00075   
00076   const unwrap<T1> tmp(o.get_ref());
00077   const basic_mat<eT>& x = tmp.M;
00078   
00079   diagview& t = *this;
00080   
00081   arma_debug_check( !x.is_vec(), "diagview::operator=(): need a vector");
00082   arma_debug_check( (t.n_elem != x.n_elem), "diagview::operator=(): diagonal and given vector have incompatible lengths");
00083   
00084   basic_mat<eT>& t_m = *(t.m_ptr);
00085   
00086   for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00087     {
00088     t_m.at(i+row_offset, i+col_offset) = x.mem[i];
00089     }
00090   
00091   }
00092 
00093 
00094 
00095 //! set a diagonal of our matrix using a diagonal from a foreign matrix
00096 template<typename eT>
00097 inline
00098 void
00099 diagview<eT>::operator= (const diagview<eT>& x)
00100   {
00101   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00102   arma_check( (m_ptr == 0), "diagview::operator=(): matrix is read only");
00103   
00104   diagview<eT>& t = *this;
00105   
00106   arma_debug_check( (t.n_elem != x.n_elem), "diagview::operator=(): diagonals have incompatible lengths");
00107   
00108         basic_mat<eT>& t_m = *(t.m_ptr);
00109   const basic_mat<eT>& x_m = x.m;
00110   
00111   for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00112     {
00113     t_m.at(i+t.row_offset, i+t.col_offset) = x_m.at(i+x.row_offset, i+x.col_offset);
00114     }
00115     
00116   }
00117 
00118 
00119 
00120 //! \brief
00121 //! extract a diagonal and store it as a column vector
00122 template<typename eT>
00123 inline
00124 void
00125 diagview<eT>::extract(basic_mat<eT>& actual_out, const diagview<eT>& in)
00126   {
00127   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00128   
00129   const basic_mat<eT>& in_m = in.m;
00130   const bool alias = (&actual_out == &in_m);
00131   
00132   basic_mat<eT>* tmp = (alias) ? new basic_mat<eT> : 0;
00133   basic_mat<eT>& out = (alias) ? (*tmp)            : actual_out;
00134   
00135   const u32 in_n_elem     = in.n_elem;
00136   const u32 in_row_offset = in.row_offset;
00137   const u32 in_col_offset = in.col_offset;
00138   
00139   out.set_size(in_n_elem,1);
00140   eT* out_mem = out.memptr();
00141   
00142   for(u32 i=0; i<in_n_elem; ++i)
00143     {
00144     out_mem[i] = in_m.at(i+in_row_offset, i+in_col_offset);
00145     }
00146   
00147   
00148   if(alias)
00149     {
00150     actual_out = out;
00151     delete tmp;
00152     }
00153   
00154   }

00157 
00158 template<typename eT>
00159 inline
00160 eT&
00161 diagview<eT>::operator[](const u32 i)
00162   {
00163   return (*m_ptr).at(i+row_offset, i+col_offset);
00164   }
00165   
00166   
00167   
00168 template<typename eT>
00169 inline
00170 eT
00171 diagview<eT>::operator[](const u32 i) const
00172   {
00173   return m.at(i+row_offset, i+col_offset);
00174   }
00175   
00176   
00177   
00178 template<typename eT>
00179 inline
00180 eT&
00181 diagview<eT>::operator()(const u32 i)
00182   {
00183   arma_check( (m_ptr == 0), "diagview::operator(): matrix is read only");
00184   arma_debug_check( (i > n_elem), "diagview::operator(): index out of bounds" );
00185   
00186   return (*m_ptr).at(i+row_offset, i+col_offset);
00187   }
00188   
00189   
00190   
00191 template<typename eT>
00192 inline
00193 eT
00194 diagview<eT>::operator()(const u32 i) const
00195   {
00196   arma_debug_check( (i > n_elem), "diagview::operator(): index out of bounds" );
00197   
00198   return m.at(i+row_offset, i+col_offset);
00199   }

00202 
00203 template<typename eT>
00204 inline
00205 void
00206 diagview<eT>::fill(const eT val)
00207   {
00208   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00209   arma_check( (m_ptr == 0), "diagview::operator(): matrix is read only");
00210   
00211   basic_mat<eT>& x = (*m_ptr);
00212   
00213   for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00214     {
00215     x.at(i+row_offset, i+col_offset) = val;
00216     }
00217   }

00221 template<typename eT>
00222 inline
00223 void
00224 diagview<eT>::zeros()
00225   {
00226   arma_extra_debug_sigprint();
00227   arma_check( (m_ptr == 0), "diagview::operator(): matrix is read only");
00228   
00229   basic_mat<eT>& x = (*m_ptr);
00230   
00231   for(u32 i=0; i<n_elem; ++i)
00232     {
00233     x.at(i+row_offset, i+col_offset) = eT(0);
00234     }
00235   }
